title: Dirty Teacher
description: Is bad boy and teacher the absolute forbidden boyfriend?  He is the ultimate bad boy, with the bad reputation and my new teacher.  But, I can’t seem to stop thinking about him.  The moment I laid my eyes on him, I knew my life would change forever!  Is it Lust?  Or Love?  Or an Obsession?  I don’t care what the other kids are saying. B  ecause I am about to put him to the test.  Can the teacher resist being tempted by a distraction like me?  WARNING: This story contains mature themes and language. Intended for 18+ readers only. It is a short-story romance. Enjoy the bonus stories!
author: Rachelle North
